results.title: Lower strings; Brass; Percussion
results.creator_credit: Declan Lowney, Jonathan Hewes and Initial (GB)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Orchestra!”.
This volume of the “Orchestra!” series examines the role of the lower strings: the cello and the double bass. Examines the effect of the invention of the valve on brass instruments and the role of percussion instruments in the orchestra.
results.description:

results.title: Introduction to Orchestra!: Upper strings. Woodwind
results.creator_credit: Declan Lowney, Jonathan Hewes and Initial (GB)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Orchestra!”.
This volume of the “Orchestra!” series provides an introduction to the methods and objectives of the series. It also examines the role of the the upper string instruments, violin and viola and the early work of Bach and Handel. It also examines the woodwind section focussing on the oboe and the use of a double reed.
results.description:

results.title: Dogs
results.creator_credit: Lex Van Os and FM-TV Entertainment
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Talk to the animals”.
In response to thousands of requests, the producers of Seven Network’s “Talk to the animals” have compiled this videotape for dog lovers of all ages. Now you can enjoy your favourite dog stories from Australia’s most popular television series again and again. Hosted by Dr. Harry Cooper.

results.title: Journey into Thailand
results.brief_description: Travel with Keith Adam as he examines the life and culture of Thailand. Each episode reveals an aspect of this ancient land, its people and history.

results.title: Tales of gods and demons
results.brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “Journey into Thailand”.
Describes the history of the masked ballet performed by Thai dancers. Explains the dance drama Ramakein and the myths and legends from which it originates.
